casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Owen JACOBS 126PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 1, 2017 Paul F. Herzog, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Jacobs, John Owen. Elizabeth J. Weese, Assistant Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Anne Bleyman, Christopher Heaney, Attorneys at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 29th of August 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of September 2017."
